title: "becca_exploration"
output: html_document
date: "2025-03-25"
---

```{r}

library(dplyr)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)

fish <- read.csv("fish_data_all_becca.csv")

fish[fish == ''] <- NA

fish <- fish %>%
  filter(if_any(FO, ~ !(.x %in% c("yes", "no")))) %>%
  drop_na(FO)

fish$FO <- as.numeric(fish$FO)

fish_group <- fish %>%
  group_by(order) %>%
  summarize(mean_fo=mean(FO))

```

```{r}

fish_dist <- ggplot(fish, aes(x=FO)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")

fish_dist

fish <- fish %>%
  mutate(log = log10(FO))

fish_dist <- ggplot(fish, aes(x=log)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")

fish_dist # did. not help

```


```{r}

order_ANOVA <- aov(FO ~ order, data = fish)

summary(order_ANOVA)

#no significant difference between orders

family_ANOVA <- aov(FO ~ family, data = fish)

summary(family_ANOVA)

#significant difference by family

```
